summary: I got carried away with this guy, but yes, I have made a playable monk.
descriptionHtml:
Unarmed (Fists with no gauntlets or gloves) damage is set to the max 60. Which seems a bit overpowered at the start unless you are playing with your difficulty set to master.

A couple goodies he gets from the get go thanks to the amazing guide at skyrim.mmo-game.eu/cheats-and-console
~A Spectral steed to call his own and ride to no end for free.
~A permanent Dremora Lord Pet that can be turned on/off by equiping/unequiping the gold neclace in inventory.



To install just drop the file into you skyrim folder, start your game and type \"bat monk\" into your console without the quotation marks.
author: Mibbitts
